thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: Natalie Gray

author: Natalie Gray
title: Natalie Gray
text:
We dealt with Richard Lam throughout our ordering process.
We had several changes to the products, size, logos etc during the process and Richard consistently provided helpful answers and solutions to all of our problems and always very promptly.
The products arrived quickly and were exactly as they were advertised.
We are extremely happy with the service and products, and will use their services again.
